plays.text: Penalty to Andrew Brunette 2 minutes for High Sticking Ruslan Salei
Penalty to Wes Walz 2 minutes for Charging PATRIC KJELLBERG
Goal scored by PATRIC KJELLBERG assisted by Paul Kariya and Keith Carney
Penalty to Ladislav Benysek 2 minutes for Hooking Paul Kariya
Penalty to Jeff Friesen 2 minutes for Crosschecking Ladislav Benysek
Penalty to Pavel Trnka 2 minutes for Holding Matt Johnson
Penalty to Jeff Friesen 2 minutes for Slashing Darby Hendrickson
Goal scored by Andrew Brunette assisted by Sergei Zholtok and Marian Gaborik
Penalty to Samuel Pahlsson 2 minutes for Holding Marian Gaborik
Goal scored by Mike Leclerc assisted by ANDY MCDONALD and Pavel Trnka
Penalty to Brad Brown 2 minutes for Elbowing PATRIC KJELLBERG
Goal scored by ANDY MCDONALD assisted by Pavel Trnka
Penalty to Aaron Gavey 2 minutes for Charging(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by ANDY MCDONALD assisted by Oleg Tverdovsky and Paul Kariya
Penalty to Vitaly Vishnevski 2 minutes for Boarding Matt Johnson
Goal scored by Mike Leclerc assisted by Jeff Friesen and Ruslan Salei
Penalty to German Titov 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding the Stick Richard Park
Penalty to Ruslan Salei 2 minutes for Crosschecking Pascal Dupuis
